newsitem.title: USA: Physician Sales signs two merger deals.
newsitem.headline: Physician Sales signs two merger deals.

text.p: Physician Sales & Service Inc said Tuesday it signed two separate definitive merger agreements representing combined revenues of $95 million in the diagnostic imaging business.

The company said it signed agreements to merge with X-Ray Corporation of Georgia, based in Atlanta, Georgia, with revenues of $45 million for the latest twelve months. Additionally, the company said it signed an agreement to merge with Chesapeake X-Ray Corp of Roanoke, Virginia.
Chesapeake generated revenues of $50 million for the latest twelve month period.

The company said the agreements are a stock-for-stock transaction, to be accounted for as a pooling of interest and the company will issue shares of common stock with a value of $11 million for X-Ray of Georgia and $7 million for Chesapeake X-Ray Corporation, subject to adjustment.
